entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
